meanings.definition: Great skill or ability in a particular field or activity.
meanings.sent1: Her virtuosity in playing the piano amazed everyone at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The musician's virtuosity on the guitar was truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: His virtuosity in solving puzzles made him the star of the game night.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved with virtuosity, as if each step was a brushstroke on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The chef's virtuosity in the kitchen turned simple ingredients into culinary masterpieces.

meanings.definition: The quality of being a virtuoso.
meanings.sent1: The virtuosity of the artist was evident in every stroke of the brush.
meanings.sent2: She admired the virtuosity of the singer's voice during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The virtuosity of the juggler made the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: His virtuosity in storytelling transported the listeners to another world.
meanings.sent5: The virtuosity of the acrobat left the spectators in awe of his talent.
